{"blocks":[{"key":"c9446","text":"Spin down overnight Ashbya culture to pellet cells in 15 mL conical tubes   300 RPM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eefll","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25vkg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aedjv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"1616571025F911ECBE21E9E18F40745F","id":"78383","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dcnq9","text":"Use a pipette to remove as much of the AFM as you can while leaving the cells at the bottom. Resuspend in 4 mL 1X LFM. Spin down again.    300 RPM. Either pipette pelleted cells from here onto the finished gel pad (steps 2.1-2.6), or do step 1.3 if the cells are too dense.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":137,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"2CF3AF0B25F911EC863B0A58A9FEAC02","id":"78384","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dkb7p","text":"Aliquot     of 1X LFM from step 1 into a 50 mL conical.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"DFC0AB3D25F811EC863B0A58A9FEAC02","id":"86300","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5hlrc","text":"Fill a 500 mL beaker with water to make a water bath and microwave the tube in   increments until the agarose is dissolved. {"blocks":[{"key":"2ur0j","text":"Drag a coverslip across the depression to create the pad.  After about 2-5 min, gently lift the coverslip off. The gel pad is now ready to use. {"blocks":[{"key":"6mj6m","text":"When ready, add   of the cells to the center of the pad. Gently cover it with a coverslip, and press gently with a kimwipe to squish the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"0368B53B25F911EC863B0A58A9FEAC02","id":"86303","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
